spec_data.Name: perl-Clipboard
spec_data.Description:
Who doesn't remember the first time they learned to copy and paste, and
generated an exponentially growing text document? Yes, that's right,
clipboards are magical.
spec_data.Signature: RSA/SHA256, Fri 28 Jul 2017 09:01:04 AM EDT, Key ID f55e7430f5282ee4
spec_data.Summary: Copy and paste with any OS
